original_text: And she gave him Bilhah her handmaid to wife: and Jacob went in unto her.
korean_text: 그의 시녀 빌하를 남편에게 아내로 주매 야곱이 그에게로 들어갔더니

sentences.original_text: And she gave him Bilhah her handmaid
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그에게 자신의 여종 빌하를 주었고

sentences.original_text: and Jacob went in unto her.
